Dreams vs Secrets Resorts: Same Family, Different Vibes

Understanding AMResorts' Family-Friendly vs Adults-Only Brands

Last updated: January 2025

Dreams and Secrets are sister brands under the AMResorts umbrella (now part of Hyatt), sharing the same Unlimited-Luxury philosophy but targeting completely different travelers. Dreams welcomes families with kids' clubs and splashy pools; Secrets reserves its beaches for adults seeking tranquility. Same ownership, same quality standards, very different experiences. This guide helps you understand which brand fits your vacation style—essential reading for anyone choosing between them.

In This Guide

  • The Quick Verdict
  • Brand Overview
  • Accommodations Compared
  • Dining Compared
  • Pool & Beach Experience
  • Activities & Entertainment
  • Service & Staff
  • Pricing & Value
  • Who Should Choose Dreams
  • Who Should Choose Secrets
  • Special Scenarios
  • Combining Both Brands
  • Final Verdict

The Quick Verdict

{<strong>TL;DR: The Core Difference</strong></p><p><strong>Dreams = Family-Friendly</strong></p><ul><li>All ages welcome</p><ul><li>Kids' clubs and family pools</p><ul><li>More activity and energy</p><ul><li>Great for multi-generational trips</p><ul><li>Slightly lower price point</p><p><strong>Secrets = Adults Only (18+)</strong></p><ul><li>No children allowed</p><ul><li>Couples, honeymooners, friends</p><ul><li>Quieter, more romantic</p><ul><li>Elevated dining and service</p><ul><li>Premium pricing</p><p><strong>Same Parent Company Benefits:</strong></p><ul><li>Unlimited-Luxury® formula identical</p><ul><li>Same quality beverages</p><ul><li>Hyatt points earning (both brands)</p><ul><li>Exchange privileges at nearby resorts</p><p><strong>Price Comparison:</strong></p><ul><li>Dreams: $350-700/night</p><ul><li>Secrets: $500-1,200/night</p><ul><li>Secrets runs 30-50% higher for similar locations}

Brand Overview

{<strong>About AMResorts</strong></p><p>AMResorts (Apple Leisure Group, now Hyatt) operates multiple brands:</p><ul><li>Dreams: Family-friendly Unlimited-Luxury</p><ul><li>Secrets: Adults-only Unlimited-Luxury</p><ul><li>Breathless: Adults-only, party-focused</p><ul><li>Zoëtry: Ultra-luxury wellness</p><ul><li>Now: Budget-friendly all-inclusive</p><ul><li>Sunscape: Value family option</p><p><strong>The Unlimited-Luxury Promise (Both Brands):</strong></p><ul><li>Premium spirits (no wristbands)</p><ul><li>24-hour room service</p><ul><li>Multiple à la carte restaurants</p><ul><li>Pool and beach wait service</p><ul><li>Daily refreshed mini-bar</p><ul><li>Free Wi-Fi throughout</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Dreams Properties in Mexico:</strong></p><ul><li>Dreams Riviera Cancún</p><ul><li>Dreams Vista Cancún</p><ul><li>Dreams Sands Cancún</p><ul><li>Dreams Playa Mujeres</p><ul><li>Dreams Huatulco</p><ul><li>Dreams Puerto Aventuras</p><ul><li>Dreams Los Cabos (Suites Golf Resort)</p><p><strong>Secrets Properties in Mexico:</strong></p><ul><li>Secrets Maroma Beach</p><ul><li>Secrets The Vine Cancún</p><ul><li>Secrets Moxché Playa del Carmen</p><ul><li>Secrets Riviera Cancún</p><ul><li>Secrets Huatulco</p><ul><li>Secrets Puerto Los Cabos</p><ul><li>Secrets Playa Mujeres}

Accommodations Compared

{<strong>Dreams Room Categories:</strong></p><p><strong>Standard Rooms:</strong></p><ul><li>450-550 sq ft typically</p><ul><li>Garden, pool, or partial ocean views</p><ul><li>King or two doubles</p><ul><li>Jetted tubs in most</p><ul><li>Balcony or terrace</p><p><strong>Preferred Club (Upgrade):</strong></p><ul><li>Better locations/views</p><ul><li>Private lounge access</p><ul><li>Concierge service</p><ul><li>Enhanced mini-bar</p><ul><li>Priority reservations</p><ul><li>Worth it for: Ocean views, quieter areas</p><p><strong>Family Suites:</strong></p><ul><li>Connecting rooms available</p><ul><li>Some resorts have swim-out family options</p><ul><li>Larger configurations for groups</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Secrets Room Categories:</strong></p><p><strong>Junior Suites (Entry Level):</strong></p><ul><li>500-650 sq ft</p><ul><li>Larger than Dreams' standard rooms</p><ul><li>Better base-level finishes</p><ul><li>Double jetted tubs</p><ul><li>All rooms technically "suites"</p><p><strong>Preferred Club (Upgrade):</strong></p><ul><li>Same benefits as Dreams PC</p><ul><li>Premium spirit selection expanded</p><ul><li>Private beach section (most properties)</p><ul><li>Butler service at top properties</p><ul><li>Worth it for: Honeymoons, anniversaries</p><p><strong>Comparison:</strong> | Feature | Dreams | Secrets | |---------|--------|----------| | Entry room size | 450-500 sq ft | 550-650 sq ft | | All suites | No | Yes | | In-room hot tubs | Some | Standard | | Swim-outs | Limited | More common | | Butler service | PC only | PC standard |}

Dining Compared

{<strong>The Shared Foundation:</strong></p><p>Both brands offer:</p><ul><li>Multiple à la carte restaurants (5-9)</p><ul><li>24-hour room service</p><ul><li>Premium spirits included</p><ul><li>Reservations recommended but flexible</p><ul><li>Buffet plus specialty options</p><p><strong>Dreams Dining:</strong></p><p><strong>Restaurant Count:</strong> 5-8 per property</p><p><strong>Common Restaurants:</strong></p><ul><li>World Café (buffet, 3 meals)</p><ul><li>French (upscale)</p><ul><li>Italian (casual elegant)</p><ul><li>Asian (teppanyaki or pan-Asian)</p><ul><li>Mexican (traditional)</p><ul><li>Seafood grill</p><ul><li>Casual options (burger bar, etc.)</p><p><strong>Family Considerations:</strong></p><ul><li>Earlier seating options</p><ul><li>Kids' menus available</p><ul><li>More casual atmosphere</p><ul><li>High chairs, boosters provided</p><ul><li>Some restaurants limit kids at dinner (adult time)</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Secrets Dining:</strong></p><p><strong>Restaurant Count:</strong> 6-10 per property</p><p><strong>Common Restaurants:</strong></p><ul><li>World Café (buffet)</p><ul><li>French fine dining</p><ul><li>Italian</p><ul><li>Asian (often separate teppanyaki + pan-Asian)</p><ul><li>Mexican regional</p><ul><li>Seafood</p><ul><li>Steakhouse (many properties)</p><ul><li>Casual grill/cafe</p><p><strong>Adults-Only Advantages:</strong></p><ul><li>Later seating times</p><ul><li>More romantic ambiance</p><ul><li>Quieter dining rooms</p><ul><li>Slightly elevated presentations</p><ul><li>Wine pairings more emphasized</p><p><strong>Quality Verdict:</strong> Secrets edges ahead on dining atmosphere and presentation. Food quality is comparable—the difference is the experience.}

Pool & Beach Experience

{<strong>Dreams Pool Experience:</strong></p><p><strong>Multiple Pools:</strong></p><ul><li>Main pool (activity central)</p><ul><li>Family pool with water features</p><ul><li>Adults-only quiet pool</p><ul><li>Kids' splash zones</p><ul><li>Swim-up bars</p><p><strong>The Atmosphere:</strong></p><ul><li>Lively, active</p><ul><li>Pool games and activities</p><ul><li>Music and entertainment</p><ul><li>Kids everywhere (except quiet pool)</p><ul><li>Volume levels vary</p><p><strong>Beach:</strong></p><ul><li>Beach service included</p><ul><li>Family-friendly</p><ul><li>Water sports hub</p><ul><li>Can be busy</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Secrets Pool Experience:</strong></p><p><strong>Multiple Pools:</strong></p><ul><li>Main infinity pool</p><ul><li>Preferred Club pool (quieter)</p><ul><li>Swim-up suites pool</p><ul><li>Hot tubs throughout</p><ul><li>Swim-up bars</p><p><strong>The Atmosphere:</strong></p><ul><li>Significantly quieter</p><ul><li>Lounge music, not party music</p><ul><li>Couples, not crowds</p><ul><li>Better lounge availability</p><ul><li>More conversation, less commotion</p><p><strong>Beach:</strong></p><ul><li>Same quality service</p><ul><li>Preferred Club often has private section</p><ul><li>Cabanas more available</p><ul><li>Romantic sunset setups</p><p><strong>Key Difference:</strong> Dreams' "adults-only" pool provides some refuge, but Secrets' entire property is the quiet pool experience. If pool ambiance matters, this is the decision-maker.}

Activities & Entertainment

{<strong>Dreams Activities:</strong></p><p><strong>Kids' Programming:</strong></p><ul><li>Explorer's Club (ages 3-12) - Full-day programming - Arts and crafts - Outdoor games - Supervised activities - Evening programs available</p><ul><li>Core Zone (ages 13-17) - Teen lounge - Age-appropriate activities - Social programming</p><p><strong>Adult Activities:</strong></p><ul><li>Fitness center</p><ul><li>Yoga and wellness classes</p><ul><li>Water sports (kayaks, paddleboards)</p><ul><li>Beach volleyball</p><ul><li>Tennis/pickleball (some properties)</p><ul><li>Cooking classes</p><ul><li>Spa (additional cost)</p><p><strong>Entertainment:</strong></p><ul><li>Nightly shows and performances</p><ul><li>Live music</p><ul><li>Theme nights</p><ul><li>Pool parties</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Secrets Activities:</strong></p><p><strong>Adults-Focused Programming:</strong></p><ul><li>Fitness center (often better equipped)</p><ul><li>Daily yoga</p><ul><li>Wine and tequila tastings</p><ul><li>Couples activities</p><ul><li>Cooking classes</p><ul><li>Art workshops</p><ul><li>Water sports</p><ul><li>Tennis/sports</p><p><strong>Entertainment:</strong></p><ul><li>Sophisticated evening shows</p><ul><li>Live music (more lounge style)</p><ul><li>Theme nights (Mexican fiesta, etc.)</p><ul><li>Quieter atmosphere overall</p><ul><li>More intimate performances</p><p><strong>The Difference:</strong> Dreams' entertainment is family-appropriate and tends toward lively. Secrets' entertainment is mature, sophisticated, and lower-volume.}

Service & Staff

{<strong>Training & Standards:</strong></p><p>Both brands undergo AMResorts training with identical service standards. The Unlimited-Luxury promise is company-wide.</p><p><strong>Dreams Service:</strong></p><p><strong>Strengths:</strong></p><ul><li>Excellent with families</p><ul><li>Patient with children</p><ul><li>Accommodating of family needs</p><ul><li>Flexible with meal times and requests</p><ul><li>Kids' club staff well-trained</p><p><strong>Considerations:</strong></p><ul><li>Staff spread across more guests types</p><ul><li>Peak family times can strain service</p><ul><li>Response times may vary during rush</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Secrets Service:</strong></p><p><strong>Strengths:</strong></p><ul><li>More personalized attention</p><ul><li>Staff can focus on fewer guest types</p><ul><li>Anticipatory service more common</p><ul><li>Romantic touches (flower arrangements, etc.)</p><ul><li>Butler service more refined</p><p><strong>Preferred Club Service:</strong></p><ul><li>Dedicated team</p><ul><li>Name recognition</p><ul><li>Personalized preferences</p><ul><li>Priority everything</p><p><strong>The Reality:</strong> Service quality is similar at the staff level—the difference is attention availability. Secrets staff have fewer variables to manage (no kids), allowing more focused service.}

Pricing & Value

{<strong>Price Ranges (Per Night, Double Occupancy):</strong></p><p><strong>Dreams:</strong> | Room Type | Low Season | High Season | Peak | |-----------|------------|-------------|------| | Standard | $350 | $500 | $700 | | Preferred Club | $450 | $650 | $900 | | Swim-out | $500 | $750 | $1,000 |</p><p><strong>Secrets:</strong> | Room Type | Low Season | High Season | Peak | |-----------|------------|-------------|------| | Junior Suite | $500 | $750 | $1,100 | | Preferred Club | $650 | $950 | $1,400 | | Swim-out PC | $800 | $1,100 | $1,600 |</p><p><strong>Per-Person Value (Family of 4 vs Couple):</strong></p><p><strong>Dreams with 2 Kids:</strong></p><ul><li>$600/night ÷ 4 people = $150/person</p><ul><li>Kids 3-12 typically stay at 50-65% of adult rate</p><ul><li>Excellent family value</p><p><strong>Secrets (2 Adults):</strong></p><ul><li>$700/night ÷ 2 people = $350/person</p><ul><li>No kids means higher per-person but no childcare needed</p><p><strong>Value Assessment:</strong></p><ul><li>Dreams: Better per-person value for families</p><ul><li>Secrets: Worth premium if adults-only matters</p><ul><li>Both: Comparable quality for their categories}

Who Should Choose Dreams

{<strong>Dreams is Perfect For:</strong></p><p>✅ <strong>Families with Children</strong> The kids' club and family pools make vacations easier. Children are welcomed, not merely tolerated.</p><p>✅ <strong>Multi-Generational Groups</strong> Grandparents, parents, and kids all find their space. Enough variety for everyone.</p><p>✅ <strong>Budget-Conscious Couples</strong> Willing to share space with families for 30-40% savings over Secrets.</p><p>✅ <strong>Active Vacationers</strong> More energy, more activities, livelier atmosphere.</p><p>✅ <strong>Spring Break Groups</strong> Friend groups who want quality without the adults-only premium.</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Dreams May NOT Be Right If:</strong></p><p>❌ Quiet pool time is essential to you ❌ You're celebrating a romantic milestone ❌ Children's noise is a dealbreaker ❌ You want the most premium experience possible ❌ You're honeymooning and want intimacy</p><p><strong>Best Dreams Properties:</strong></p><p>1. <strong>Dreams Riviera Cancún</strong> - Best overall family resort, great beach</p><ol><li><strong>Dreams Playa Mujeres</strong> - Newer, excellent facilities</p><ol><li><strong>Dreams Vista Cancún</strong> - Modern, good kids' club}

Who Should Choose Secrets

{<strong>Secrets is Perfect For:</strong></p><p>✅ <strong>Honeymooners</strong> Romantic atmosphere, adult-only guarantee, special touches throughout.</p><p>✅ <strong>Anniversary Celebrations</strong> Elevated experience for marking milestones.</p><p>✅ <strong>Couples Needing a Break</strong> Parents escaping for adult time deserve quiet pools.</p><p>✅ <strong>Friend Groups (Adults)</strong> Bachelor/bachelorette parties, girls' trips, couples' getaways.</p><p>✅ <strong>Older Travelers</strong> Those who prefer sophistication over activity.</p><p>✅ <strong>Anyone Who Values Quiet</strong> If pool noise matters, Secrets is the answer.</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Secrets May NOT Be Right If:</strong></p><p>❌ You're traveling with children (they can't stay) ❌ Budget is the primary driver ❌ You prefer lively, active atmosphere ❌ You want family vacation memories</p><p><strong>Best Secrets Properties:</strong></p><p>1. <strong>Secrets Maroma Beach</strong> - Best beach, most famous</p><ol><li><strong>Secrets Moxché</strong> - Newest, modern design</p><ol><li><strong>Secrets The Vine</strong> - Cancún Hotel Zone, walkable</p><ol><li><strong>Secrets Playa Mujeres</strong> - Quiet, excellent golf access}

Special Scenarios

{<strong>Honeymoon: Which Brand?</strong></p><p><strong>Secrets Wins</strong> for honeymoons:</p><ul><li>Romantic atmosphere guaranteed</p><ul><li>No children at dinner</p><ul><li>Better room categories for the price point</p><ul><li>More romantic beach setups</p><ul><li>Preferred Club butler service</p><p>*Exception:* If you're honeymooning with extended family (they have kids), Dreams allows everyone to stay together.</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Anniversary Trip:</strong></p><p><strong>Secrets Wins</strong> again:</p><ul><li>Sophistication matches the milestone</p><ul><li>Quieter, more intimate</p><ul><li>Better for reminiscing</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Babymoon (Pregnant Travelers):</strong></p><p><strong>Either Works:</strong></p><ul><li>Secrets: Enjoy adult-only time before baby</p><ul><li>Dreams: See what family vacation will look like</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Multi-Generational Trip:</strong></p><p><strong>Dreams Wins:</strong></p><ul><li>Only option with kids</p><ul><li>Adults can use quiet pool</p><ul><li>Kids' club frees up grandparents</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Friend Group (No Kids):</strong></p><p><strong>Depends on Group:</strong></p><ul><li>Secrets: Sophistication, quiet, couples-focused</p><ul><li>Dreams: More activity, lower cost, livelier</p><ul><li>Party-seekers: Consider Breathless instead}

Combining Both Brands

{<strong>The Exchange Privilege:</strong></p><p>AMResorts offers Sip, Savor & See dining exchange between nearby properties. At some locations, Dreams and Secrets are close enough to dine at each other.</p><p><strong>Example: Riviera Cancún Area</strong></p><ul><li>Dreams Riviera Cancún</p><ul><li>Secrets Riviera Cancún</p><ul><li>Close proximity allows visits</p><p><strong>How It Works:</strong></p><ul><li>Usually one dinner per stay allowed</p><ul><li>Reservations required</p><ul><li>Transportation may be provided or arranged</p><ul><li>Dress codes apply</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Split Stay Option:</strong></p><p>For couples who want both experiences:</p><p>*Days 1-3: Dreams*</p><ul><li>Lower cost entry</p><ul><li>More activity and energy</p><ul><li>Sample the brand</p><p>*Days 4-7: Secrets*</p><ul><li>Upgrade to adults-only</p><ul><li>End trip in tranquility</p><ul><li>Romantic finale</p><p><strong>When This Makes Sense:</strong></p><ul><li>If family joins for part of trip</p><ul><li>If you want to compare both brands</p><ul><li>If budget allows for variety}

Final Verdict

{<strong>Dreams</strong> delivers excellent family-friendly all-inclusive vacations with the Unlimited-Luxury promise. The kids' clubs are well-run, the food is good, and families can relax knowing their children are welcome. Budget-conscious couples can find value here too, accepting the family atmosphere for significant savings.</p><p><strong>Secrets</strong> provides the adults-only sanctuary that honeymooners, anniversary couples, and exhausted parents crave. The premium price buys guaranteed quiet, romantic atmospheres, and slightly elevated everything. For milestone celebrations or couples needing genuine relaxation, it's worth every extra dollar.</p><p><strong>The Simple Decision:</strong></p><ul><li>Traveling with anyone under 18? → Dreams</p><ul><li>Adults-only and budget matters? → Dreams</p><ul><li>Adults-only and peace matters? → Secrets</p><ul><li>Honeymoon or anniversary? → Secrets</p><ul><li>Can't decide? → Dreams for first trip, Secrets for celebration trip</p><p><strong>Our Recommendations:</strong></p><ul><li>Family vacation: Dreams Riviera Cancún</p><ul><li>Honeymoon: Secrets Maroma Beach</p><ul><li>Budget couples trip: Dreams Vista Cancún</p><ul><li>Romantic splurge: Secrets Preferred Club anywhere</p><ul><li>Multi-gen trip: Dreams Playa Mujeres}

Frequently Asked Questions

Can children stay at Secrets resorts?

No. Secrets resorts are strictly adults-only (18+). This is a core brand promise and is not negotiable. If you're traveling with anyone under 18, Dreams, Now, or Sunscape are the AMResorts family-friendly options.

Is the food better at Secrets than Dreams?

Food quality is comparable—both brands use similar suppliers and recipes. The difference is atmosphere: Secrets restaurants are quieter, more romantic, and slightly more refined in presentation. You'll eat well at both; the experience just differs.

Can Dreams guests visit Secrets restaurants?

At some locations where both brands operate nearby (like Riviera Cancún), the Sip, Savor & See program allows guests to dine at sister properties. Check with your resort for specific exchange privileges—usually one dinner visit is included.

Is Dreams good for couples without kids?

Yes, especially budget-conscious couples. Dreams offers adults-only quiet pools for escape from families, and you'll save 30-40% compared to Secrets. Just know that children will be present at meals, main pools, and beaches. If that's fine, Dreams delivers excellent value for couples.

Which brand has better rooms?

Secrets rooms are larger on average and all are classified as suites. Dreams rooms are good quality but slightly smaller at entry level. For the best room experience regardless of brand, upgrade to Preferred Club—the benefits are similar at both but Secrets PC edges ahead on service touches.
